exceptions.tactic: split; [| split; unfold pDst, pSrc, pBody in H; destruct p; reflexivity].
exceptions.exn: Unable to find an instance for the variable x.

original: intros p net H. destruct H as [H | H]. - exists p. split. apply H. split; [| split; unfold pDst, pSrc, pBody in H; destruct p; reflexivity]. - apply H.
